  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660c-4254-43b1-25c5-2a8c49e1029c#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Eucharisztikus lakoma, 2. század, Priscilla-katakomba, Capella Greca, Róma, falfestmény, freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Eucharistic feast, 2nd century, Priscilla-catacomb, Capella Greca, Rome, wall painting, fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eucharistic Fest, 2. Jahrhundert, 
Priscilla-Katakombe, Kapella Greca, Rom, Wandanstrich, Fresko.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Régal d'eucharistique, 2ème siècle, 
Priscilla-catacombes, Capella Greca, Rome, peinture de mur, fresque.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Festa de Eucharistic, ò século, 
Priscilla-priscilla-catacomb, Capella Greca, Roma, pintura da parede, 
fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Festività di Eucharistic, secondo secolo, 
Priscilla-priscilla-catacomb, Capella Greca, Roma, pittura della 
parete, fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Της Θείας Ευχαριστίας γιορτή, 2$ος αιώνας, 
πρησθηλλα-κατακόμβη, capella Greca, Ρώμη, ζωγραφική τοίχων, 
νωπογραφία.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Banquete de Eucharistic, 2do siglo, 
Priscilla-priscilla-catacomb, Capella Greca, Roma, pintura de la 
pared, fresco.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az egyik legszebb épen maradt katakomba freskó, melyen</string>
            <string language="en">The one of the most beautiful catacomb fresco which remained intact</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">eucharisztikus lakoma,  fractio panis,  Krisztus,  tanítványok,  </string>
            <string language="en">eucharistic feast, fractio panis, Christ, disciples</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das des schönsten Katakombefreskos, das intakt blieb</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Celui du fresque de catacombes le plus beau qui est resté
intact</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esse do fresco o mais bonito do catacomb que remanesceu 
intact</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quello del fresco del catacomb più bello che è rimasto 
intact</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια από την ομορφότερη νωπογραφία κατακομβών που 
παρέμεινε άθικτη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El que esta' del fresco más hermoso del catacomb que 
permanecía intacto</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eucharistic Fest, fractio panis, Christ, Schüler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">régal d'eucharistique, panis de fractio, le Christ, 
disciples</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">festa eucharistic, panis do fractio, Christ, disciples</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">festività eucharistic, panis di fractio, Christ, 
disciples</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">της Θείας Ευχαριστίας γιορτή, panis fractio, Χριστός, 
απόστολοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">banquete eucharistic, panis del fractio, Cristo, 
discípulos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
